Colour.name: Curcumin
Colour.examples: Used in pastries, confectionery, sauces, and soups

Colour.name: Riboflavin or lactoflavin (Vitamin B2)
description: Usually obtained from yeast or produced synthetically
Colour.examples: Added to processed cheese as yellow/orange colour

Colour.name: Quinoline Yellow
Colour.examples: Found in soft drinks, cakes, biscuits, puddings, meat products, sauces, tinned and packet convenience foods and confectionery

Colour.name: Quinoline Yellow
description: A synthetic coal tar dye, greenish yellow in colour
Colour.examples: Used with other yellow colours, especially in smoked fish

Colour.name: Sunset Yellow FCF; Orange Yellow S
description: A synthetic coal tar dye, yellow in colour, used with E102
Colour.examples: Found in soft drinks, cakes, biscuits, puddings, meat products, sauces, tinned and packet convenience foods and confectionery
